plot: The inmates of a German World War II prisoner of war camp conduct an espionage and sabotage campaign right under the noses of their warders.
plot_en: The inmates of a German World War II prisoner of war camp conduct an espionage and sabotage campaign right under the noses of their warders.
plot_es: The inmates of a German World War II prisoner of war camp conduct an espionage and sabotage campaign right under the noses of their warders.
title: Hogan's Heroes
